content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/Refactoring-Bot is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. I should:

1. First, explore the repository structure to understand the project
2. Look at the pom.xml or build.gradle files to see the current Java version configuration
3. Update the Java version to 17
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if there are any compilation or test issues
5. Fix any issues that arise due to the migration
6. Repeat until `mvn clean verify` succeeds
